name: A C

name: Isabella Caine
text: The pizza here is delicious, amazing and flavorful whether you order a special or a custom one. You'll find that it's quite filling and you may be left with leftovers. If you're okay with that, this is an amazing go-to place if you feel like having pizza!

name: John Bussell
text: Pizza was great! I got the Marley which was new there! It was very good. The pretzel bites were delicious with their sauce. Service was fast and friendly. I'll be back!!

name: Peter Demery
text: This is a awesome place to get you munch on food is fantastic Crystal was awesome...

name: jon's wife
text: It's not bad but I probably won't go back. The soup was't bad. The burger was ok. Wait staff was blaise. I was expecting a more fun environment. Music kicked butt! I just thought for the money the food would've been a little better.

name: Amber Mentzer
text: Won‚Äôt be going here anymore after hearing how they insist on treating staff after they expressed concerns over being exposed to COVID-19 and the absolute disregard to comply with OSHA or CDC guidelines to protect customers AND STAFF! Just ‚Ä¶More

name: Thomas Williams
text: Very good food, outstanding service. Our server was very sweet and helpful.

name: Doug Deal
text: Better than Ingleside which for ao.e reason is highly overrated in Macon.

name: Chris Roden
text: Great place to hang out. The bartenders are very cool and social. The pizza is really good as far as pizza goes, with a large variety of toppings. The only thing that keeps it from 5 stars is being there before 9pm when all the very loud children have their parties. Not complaining, just if you want to hang with friends, go after 9pm.

name: Dr. Daniel Erthal
text: Most of the menus items are very good, the sandwiches, salads and soups are top notch.  The pizza on the other hand I give 2 of 5 stars just okay at best just very bland. This place has an awesome bar with a great craft beer selection.

name: josh atkinson
text: Always great food, had live music on Saturday.

name: Jeremy Williams
text: We love their calzones.

name: Daren Moore
text: Staff is wonderful. The food is absolutely wonderful.

name: Cherish Walker
text: Normally love mellow mushroom...maybe they have new cooks...idk, I got a calzone asked for extra cheese....there was no ricotta in it, and no extra cheese. Husband always gets Pacific rim pizza....there was no pineapple on it..... hoping it will get better, we love their food.

name: Diane Jolly
text: This was my first time eating lunch at Mellow Mushroom and my daughter and I love it üòç
